purpose: The email announces two postdoctoral positions available at UCLouvain, Belgium, specifically for candidates with a Ph.D. in computer science who are currently outside Belgium. The positions are part of the RAINDROP project, focusing on edge/cloud computing, and offer competitive salaries and support. Interested candidates are encouraged to contact the professors for more information and to discuss potential research directions.
